00085 
00086 void TestFileGenerator::WriteOutGenericDATDataFile1UsingRawWrites()
00087 {
00088         // Open the file.
00089         ofstream fileStream;
00090         Fs::aptOpen(fileStream,  "test.file.data_dat.raw", ios_base::out | ios_base::binary | ios_base::trunc);
00091 
00092         //
00093         // Header
00094         //
00095 
00096         // magic number
00097         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(fileStream, 59);
00098 
00099         // version
00100         FileOutput::WriteInt8(fileStream, 1);
00101 
00102         // Number of data cubes - confirm this
00103         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, 1);
00104 
00105         // offset to the data cube byte offset array
00106         int offsetLocation = fileStream.tellp();
00107         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, 1); //????
00108 
00109         //
00110         // Generic Header
00111         //
00112 
00113         // dataTypeIdentifier
00114         FileOutput::WriteString8(fileStream, SCAN_ACQUISITION_DATA_TYPE);
00115 
00116         // unique file identifier
00117         FileOutput::WriteString8(fileStream, "test-dat-guid");
00118 
00119         // Date and time creation
00120 //      FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00121         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"2004-07-04T11:12:13Z");
00122 
00123         // Locale
00124         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"en-US");
00125 
00126         // Number of parameters
00127         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, 3);
00128 
00129         // Name-value pairs
00130         // probe array type
00131         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, ARRAY_TYPE_PARAM_NAME);
00132         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"Hg-U133A");
00133         
00134         // barcode
00135         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, ARRAY_BARCODE_PARAM_NAME);
00136         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"Barcode");
00137 
00138         // Other
00139         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"Parameter1");
00140         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"Value1");
00141 
00142         // Number of parent files
00143         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, 1);
00144 
00145         // Parent GenericDataHeader - array file
00146 
00147         // dataTypeIdentifier
00148         FileOutput::WriteString8(fileStream, ARRAY_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00149 
00150         // unique file identifier
00151         FileOutput::WriteString8(fileStream, "test-array-guid");
00152 
00153         // Date and time creation
00154 //      FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00155         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"2004-07-01T13:14:15Z");
00156 
00157         // Locale
00158         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"en-US");
00159 
00160         // Number of parameters
00161         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, 2);
00162 
00163         // Name-value pair
00164         // probe array type
00165         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, ARRAY_TYPE_PARAM_NAME);
00166         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"Hg-U133A");
00167         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, ARRAY_LOT_PARAM_NAME);
00168         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"Thanks alot");
00169 
00170         // Number of parent files
00171         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, 0);
00172 
00173         //
00174         // Data Cube
00175         //
00176 
00177         int offset = fileStream.tellp();
00178 
00179         // Data cube header
00180 
00181         // Data cube name
00182         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"acquired data");
00183 
00184         // Number of parameters
00185         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, 2);
00186 
00187         // Name-value pairs
00188         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"Scanner");
00189         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"M10");
00190         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"Pixel Size");
00191         FileOutput::WriteString16(fileStream, L"0.051");
00192 
00193         // Number of columns - there is one column of unsigned shorts (pixel data)
00194         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, 1);
00195 
00196         // Array of value types
00197         FileOutput::WriteInt8(fileStream, 3);   // UShort
00198 
00199         // Array of value sizes
00200         FileOutput::WriteInt32(fileStream, 2);
00201 
00202         // Number of rows in the data cube
00203         int32_t rows = 100;
00204         FileOutput::WriteInt32(fileStream, rows);
00205 
00206         // Write out the data
00207         for( int32_t i=0; i < rows; ++i )
00208         {
00209                 u_int16_t value = (u_int16_t)(i*10+i);
00210                 FileOutput::WriteUInt16(fileStream, value);
00211         }
00212 
00213         // write the offset
00214         fileStream.seekp(offsetLocation);
00215         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, offset);
00216 
00217         fileStream.close();
00218 
00219 }
00220 
00221 void TestFileGenerator::AddStandardGenericDataHeader(GenericDataHeader& gdh)
00222 {
00223         // Fill the GenericDataHeader.
00224         gdh.SetFileTypeId(SCAN_ACQUISITION_DATA_TYPE);
00225         gdh.SetFileId("test-dat-guid");
00226         gdh.SetFileCreationTime(L"2004-07-04T11:12:13Z");
00227         gdh.SetLocale(L"en-US");
00228         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00229         nvt.SetName(ARRAY_TYPE_PARAM_NAME);
00230         nvt.SetValueText(L"Hg-U133A");
00231         gdh.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00232         nvt.SetName(ARRAY_BARCODE_PARAM_NAME);
00233         nvt.SetValueText(L"Barcode");
00234         gdh.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00235         nvt.SetName(L"Parameter1");
00236         nvt.SetValueText(L"Value1");
00237         gdh.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00238 
00239         GenericDataHeader gdhParent;
00240         gdhParent.SetFileTypeId(ARRAY_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00241         gdhParent.SetFileId("test-array-guid");
00242         gdhParent.SetFileCreationTime(L"2004-07-01T13:14:15Z");
00243         gdhParent.SetLocale(L"en-US");
00244         nvt.SetName(ARRAY_TYPE_PARAM_NAME);
00245         nvt.SetValueText(L"Hg-U133A");
00246         gdhParent.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00247         nvt.SetName(ARRAY_LOT_PARAM_NAME);
00248         nvt.SetValueText(L"Thanks alot");
00249         gdhParent.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00250 
00251         gdh.AddParent(gdhParent);
00252 }
00253 
00254 // Uses a mix of the GenericFileWriter and raw commands
00255 void TestFileGenerator::WriteOutGenericDATDataFile1UsingGenericWriter()
00256 {
00257         GenericDataHeader gdh;
00258         AddStandardGenericDataHeader(gdh);
00259 
00260         // Fill the DataSetHeader
00261         DataSetHeader dph;
00262         dph.SetName(L"acquired data");
00263         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00264         nvt.SetName(L"Scanner");
00265         nvt.SetValueText(L"M10");
00266         dph.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00267         nvt.SetName(L"Pixel Size");
00268         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.051f);
00269         dph.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00270         dph.AddColumn(UShortColumn(L"Pixel"));
00271 
00272         int32_t rows = 100;
00273         dph.SetRowCnt(rows);
00274 
00275         // Open the file.
00276         ofstream fileStream;
00277         Fs::aptOpen(fileStream, "test.file.data_dat", ios_base::out | ios_base::binary | ios_base::trunc);
00278 
00279         // Write the file header using raw methods until the writer is available.
00280         // magic number
00281         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(fileStream, 59);
00282 
00283         // version
00284         FileOutput::WriteInt8(fileStream, 1);
00285 
00286         // Number of data cubes - confirm this
00287         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, 1);
00288 
00289         // offset to the data cube byte offset array
00290         int offsetLocation = fileStream.tellp();
00291         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, 1); //????
00292 
00293         // Write the GenericDataHeader to the file
00294         GenericDataHeaderWriter gdhWriter;
00295         gdhWriter.Write(fileStream, gdh);
00296 
00297 
00298         //
00299         // Data Cube
00300         //
00301 
00302         int offset = fileStream.tellp();
00303 
00304         // Write the DataSetHeader
00305         DataSetWriter dphWriter(&fileStream, &dph);
00306         dphWriter.WriteHeader();
00307 
00308         // Write out the data
00309         for( int32_t i=0; i < rows; ++i )
00310         {
00311                 u_int16_t value = (u_int16_t)(i*10+i);
00312                 FileOutput::WriteUInt16(fileStream, value);
00313         }
00314 
00315         // write the offset
00316         fileStream.seekp(offsetLocation);
00317         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(fileStream, offset);
00318 
00319         fileStream.close();
00320 
00321 }

00382 
00383 void TestFileGenerator::WriteOutGenericDATDataFileNoGrid()
00384 {
00385         GenericDataHeader gdh;
00386         AddStandardGenericDataHeader(gdh);
00387 
00388         // Fill the DataGroupHeader
00389         DataGroupHeader dch;
00390         dch.SetName(L"First Data Cube");
00391 
00392         // Fill the DataSetHeader
00393         DataSetHeader dph;
00394         dph.SetName(L"acquired data");
00395         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00396         nvt.SetName(L"Scanner");
00397         nvt.SetValueText(L"M10");
00398         dph.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00399         nvt.SetName(L"Pixel Size");
00400         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.051f);
00401         dph.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00402 
00403         dph.AddColumn(UShortColumn(L"Pixel"));
00404 
00405         int32_t rows = 100;
00406         dph.SetRowCnt(rows);
00407 
00408         dch.AddDataSetHdr(dph);
00409 
00410         // Set the FileHeader
00411         FileHeader fh;
00412         fh.SetFilename("test.file.data_dat");
00413         fh.SetGenericDataHdr(gdh);
00414         fh.AddDataGroupHdr(dch);
00415 
00416         // Create the generic file writer
00417         GenericFileWriter gfWriter(&fh);
00418         gfWriter.WriteHeader();
00419 
00420         DataGroupWriterIt dcwBegin, dcwEnd;
00421         gfWriter.GetDataGroupWriters(dcwBegin, dcwEnd);
00422 
00423         DataGroupWriter d = *dcwBegin;
00424         dcwBegin->WriteHeader();
00425 
00426         DataSetWriterIt dpwBegin, dpwEnd;
00427         dcwBegin->GetDataSetWriters(dpwBegin, dpwEnd);
00428 
00429         dpwBegin->WriteHeader();
00430 
00431         // Write out the data
00432         for( int32_t i=0; i < rows; ++i )
00433         {
00434                 u_int16_t value = (u_int16_t)(i*10+i);
00435                 dpwBegin->Write(value);
00436         }
00437 
00438         dpwBegin->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00439         dcwBegin->Close();
00440 }
00441 
00442 
00443 void TestFileGenerator::WriteOutGenericDATDataFileWithGrid()
00444 {
00445         GenericDataHeader gdh;
00446         AddStandardGenericDataHeader(gdh);
00447 
00448         // Fill the DataGroupHeader
00449         DataGroupHeader dch;
00450         dch.SetName(L"");       // unnamed DataGroup
00451 
00452         // Fill the pixel intensity DataSetHeader
00453         DataSetHeader dphPixel;
00454         dphPixel.SetName(L"acquired data");
00455         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00456         nvt.SetName(L"Scanner");
00457         nvt.SetValueText(L"M10");
00458         dphPixel.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00459         nvt.SetName(L"Pixel Size");
00460         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.051f);
00461         dphPixel.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00462 
00463         dphPixel.AddColumn(UShortColumn(L"Pixel"));
00464 
00465         int32_t rows = 1000;
00466         dphPixel.SetRowCnt(rows);
00467 
00468         dch.AddDataSetHdr(dphPixel);
00469 
00470         // Fill the grid DataSetHeader
00471         DataSetHeader dphGrid;
00472         dphGrid.SetName(L"grid position");
00473         nvt.SetName(L"GhostGrids");
00474         nvt.SetValueText(L"True");
00475         dphGrid.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00476         nvt.SetName(L"Pixel Size");
00477         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.051f);
00478         dphGrid.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00479 
00480         dphGrid.AddColumn(FloatColumn(L"Upper left x"));
00481         dphGrid.AddColumn(FloatColumn(L"Upper left y"));
00482         dphGrid.AddColumn(FloatColumn(L"Upper right x"));
00483         dphGrid.AddColumn(FloatColumn(L"Upper right y"));
00484         dphGrid.AddColumn(FloatColumn(L"Lower right x"));
00485         dphGrid.AddColumn(FloatColumn(L"Lower right y"));
00486         dphGrid.AddColumn(FloatColumn(L"Lower left x"));
00487         dphGrid.AddColumn(FloatColumn(L"Lower left y"));
00488 
00489         int32_t grids = 5;      // first is the global grid with 4 subgrids
00490         dphGrid.SetRowCnt(grids);
00491 
00492         dch.AddDataSetHdr(dphGrid);
00493 
00494         // Set the FileHeader
00495         FileHeader fh;
00496         fh.SetFilename("test.file.data_dat_with_grid");
00497         fh.SetGenericDataHdr(gdh);
00498         fh.AddDataGroupHdr(dch);
00499 
00500         // Create the generic file writer
00501         GenericFileWriter gfWriter(&fh);
00502         gfWriter.WriteHeader();
00503 
00504         DataGroupWriterIt dcwBegin, dcwEnd;
00505         gfWriter.GetDataGroupWriters(dcwBegin, dcwEnd);
00506 
00507         DataGroupWriter d = *dcwBegin;
00508         dcwBegin->WriteHeader();
00509 
00510         DataSetWriterIt dpwBegin, dpwEnd;
00511         dcwBegin->GetDataSetWriters(dpwBegin, dpwEnd);
00512 
00513         // Write out the pixel DataSet
00514 
00515         dpwBegin->WriteHeader();
00516 
00517         for( int32_t i=0; i < rows; ++i )
00518         {
00519                 u_int16_t value = (u_int16_t)(i*10+i);
00520                 dpwBegin->Write(value);
00521         }
00522 
00523         dpwBegin->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00524 
00525         ++dpwBegin;
00526 
00527         // Write out the grid DataSet
00528 
00529         dpwBegin->WriteHeader();
00530 
00531         for( int32_t i=0; i < grids; ++i )
00532         {
00533                 for (int32_t corner = 0; corner < 4; ++corner)
00534                 {
00535                         float value = (float)(i*100 + corner);
00536                         dpwBegin->Write(value);
00537                         dpwBegin->Write(value);
00538                 }
00539         }
00540 
00541         dpwBegin->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00542 
00543         dcwBegin->Close();
00544 }
00545 
00546 void TestFileGenerator::WriteOutGenericDataFileWithAllColumnTypes()
00547 {
00548         GenericDataHeader gdh;
00549         AddStandardGenericDataHeader(gdh);
00550 
00551         // Fill the DataGroupHeader
00552         DataGroupHeader dch;
00553         dch.SetName(L"default");        // default DataGroup
00554 
00555         // Fill the all types DataSetHeader
00556         DataSetHeader dphAT;
00557         dphAT.SetName(L"all types");
00558         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00559         nvt.SetName(L"How many types");
00560         nvt.SetValueText(L"All types");
00561         dphAT.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00562         nvt.SetName(L"Powered by");
00563         nvt.SetValueText(L"Affymetrix");
00564         dphAT.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00565 
00566         dphAT.AddColumn(ByteColumn(L"Byte type"));
00567         dphAT.AddColumn(UByteColumn(L"UByte type"));
00568         dphAT.AddColumn(ASCIIColumn(L"ASCII type", 10));
00569         dphAT.AddColumn(ShortColumn(L"Short type"));
00570         dphAT.AddColumn(UShortColumn(L"UShort type"));
00571         dphAT.AddColumn(IntColumn(L"Int type"));
00572         dphAT.AddColumn(UIntColumn(L"UInt type"));
00573         dphAT.AddColumn(UnicodeColumn(L"Unicode type", 15));
00574         dphAT.AddColumn(FloatColumn(L"Float type"));
00575 
00576         int32_t rows = 2;
00577         dphAT.SetRowCnt(rows);
00578 
00579         dch.AddDataSetHdr(dphAT);
00580 
00581         // Set the FileHeader
00582         FileHeader fh;
00583         fh.SetFilename("test.file.data_all_column_types");
00584         fh.SetGenericDataHdr(gdh);
00585         fh.AddDataGroupHdr(dch);
00586 
00587         // Create the generic file writer
00588         GenericFileWriter gfWriter(&fh);
00589         gfWriter.WriteHeader();
00590 
00591         DataGroupWriterIt dcwBegin, dcwEnd;
00592         gfWriter.GetDataGroupWriters(dcwBegin, dcwEnd);
00593 
00594         DataGroupWriter d = *dcwBegin;
00595         dcwBegin->WriteHeader();
00596 
00597         DataSetWriterIt dpwBegin, dpwEnd;
00598         dcwBegin->GetDataSetWriters(dpwBegin, dpwEnd);
00599 
00600         // Write out the all types DataSet
00601 
00602         dpwBegin->WriteHeader();
00603 
00604         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00605         {
00606                 char str[10];
00607                 wchar_t wstr[15];
00608                 int8_t b = 1+10*row;
00609                 u_int8_t ub = 2+10*row;
00610                 sprintf(str, "%d", 3+10*row);
00611                 int16_t s = 4+10*row;
00612                 u_int16_t us = 5+10*row;
00613                 int32_t i = 6+10*row;
00614                 u_int32_t ui = 7+10*row;
00615                 FormatString1(wstr, 15, L"%d", 8+10*row);
00616                 float f = 9+10*row;
00617 
00618                 dpwBegin->Write(b);     // btye
00619                 dpwBegin->Write(ub);    // unsigned byte
00620                 dpwBegin->Write(str, 10);       // ACSII string
00621                 dpwBegin->Write(s);     // short
00622                 dpwBegin->Write(us);    // unsigned short
00623                 dpwBegin->Write(i);     // int
00624                 dpwBegin->Write(ui);    // unsigned int
00625                 dpwBegin->Write(wstr, 15);      // Unicode string
00626                 dpwBegin->Write(f);     // float
00627         }
00628 
00629         dpwBegin->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00630         dcwBegin->Close();
00631 }
00632 
00633 void TestFileGenerator::WriteSmallCelFile()
00634 {
00635         CelFileData data("small_cel_file");
00636         data.SetIntensityCount(25);
00637         data.SetStdDevCount(25);
00638         data.SetPixelCount(25);
00639         data.SetOutlierCount(2);
00640         data.SetMaskCount(3);
00641         data.SetRows(5);
00642         data.SetCols(5);
00643         data.SetArrayType(L"Hg-small");
00644         data.SetAlgorithmName(L"Feature Extraction");
00645         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00646         nvt.SetName(L"percentile");
00647         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.75f);
00648         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00649         nvt.SetName(L"outlierlow");
00650         nvt.SetValueFloat(1.004f);
00651         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00652 
00653         CelFileWriter* writer = new CelFileWriter(data);
00654 
00655         FloatVector vInten;
00656         FloatVector vStdev;
00657         Int16Vector vPixels;
00658 
00659         for (int i=0; i<25; ++i)
00660         {
00661                 vInten.push_back(100.0f*i);
00662                 vStdev.push_back(.5*i);
00663                 vPixels.push_back(25);
00664         }
00665 
00666         // Do some writing
00667         writer->WriteIntensities(vInten);
00668         writer->WriteStdDevs(vStdev);
00669         writer->WritePixels(vPixels);
00670 
00671 //      XYCoordVector
00672         XYCoordVector outlier;
00673         XYCoord xy(0,0);
00674         outlier.push_back(xy);
00675         xy.xCoord = 1;
00676         xy.yCoord = 2;
00677         outlier.push_back(xy);
00678         writer->WriteOutlierCoords(outlier);
00679 
00680         XYCoordVector masked;
00681         xy.xCoord = 1;
00682         xy.yCoord = 0;
00683         masked.push_back(xy);
00684         xy.xCoord = 2;
00685         xy.yCoord = 1;
00686         masked.push_back(xy);
00687         xy.xCoord = 3;
00688         xy.yCoord = 2;
00689         masked.push_back(xy);
00690         writer->WriteMaskCoords(masked);
00691 
00692         delete writer;
00693 }

00759 void TestFileGenerator::WriteRemaingSmallCelFileWithGridParameters(CelFileData& data)
00760 {
00761         data.SetIntensityCount(25);
00762         data.SetStdDevCount(25);
00763         data.SetPixelCount(25);
00764         data.SetOutlierCount(2);
00765         data.SetMaskCount(3);
00766         data.SetRows(5);
00767         data.SetCols(5);
00768         data.SetArrayType(L"Hg-small");
00769     data.SetLibraryPackageName(L"Hg-small-lib-package");
00770     data.SetMasterFileName(L"Hg-small-master-file");
00771         data.SetAlgorithmName(L"Feature Extraction");
00772         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00773         nvt.SetName(L"percentile");
00774         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.75f);
00775         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00776         nvt.SetName(L"outlierlow");
00777         nvt.SetValueFloat(1.004f);
00778         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00779         nvt.SetName(L"CellMargin");
00780         nvt.SetValueInt32(2);
00781         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00782 
00783         // Add grid
00784         const wchar_t* gridParams[] = {
00785     L"GridULX", L"GridULY", L"GridURX", L"GridURY",
00786     L"GridLRX", L"GridLRY", L"GridLLX", L"GridLLY"};
00787         for (int32_t i = 0; i < 8; ++i)
00788         {
00789                 nvt.SetName(gridParams[i]);
00790                 nvt.SetValueFloat(2.0f + (float)i);
00791                 data.AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00792         }
00793 
00794         CelFileWriter* writer = new CelFileWriter(data);
00795 
00796         FloatVector vInten;
00797         FloatVector vStdev;
00798         Int16Vector vPixels;
00799 
00800         for (int i=0; i<25; ++i)
00801         {
00802                 vInten.push_back(100.0f*i);
00803                 vStdev.push_back(.5*i);
00804                 vPixels.push_back(25);
00805         }
00806 
00807         // Do some writing
00808         writer->WriteIntensities(vInten);
00809         writer->WriteStdDevs(vStdev);
00810         writer->WritePixels(vPixels);
00811 
00812 //      XYCoordVector
00813         XYCoordVector outlier;
00814         XYCoord xy(0,0);
00815         outlier.push_back(xy);
00816         xy.xCoord = 1;
00817         xy.yCoord = 2;
00818         outlier.push_back(xy);
00819         writer->WriteOutlierCoords(outlier);
00820 
00821         XYCoordVector masked;
00822         xy.xCoord = 1;
00823         xy.yCoord = 0;
00824         masked.push_back(xy);
00825         xy.xCoord = 2;
00826         xy.yCoord = 1;
00827         masked.push_back(xy);
00828         xy.xCoord = 3;
00829         xy.yCoord = 2;
00830         masked.push_back(xy);
00831         writer->WriteMaskCoords(masked);
00832 
00833         delete writer;
00834 }

00836 void TestFileGenerator::WriteSmallCelFileWithAPartialDatHeaderTest()
00837 {
00838         CelFileData data("small_cel_file_partial_datheader");
00839 
00840         // Write 
00841         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00842         GenericDataHeader datHdr;
00843         datHdr.SetFileId(AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid());
00844         datHdr.SetFileTypeId("affymetrix-calvin-scan-acquisition");
00845         datHdr.SetFileCreationTime(L"2004-07-01T13:14:15Z");
00846         nvt.SetName(L"affymetrix-partial-dat-header");
00847         std::wstring datHeaderString = L"  small_cel_file_partial_datheader:CLS=25   RWS=25   XIN=1  YIN=1  VE=0         0   05/19/05 02:45:59 ScannerID:  ScannerTyp   \x14  \x14 Hg-Small.1sq \x14  \x14  \x14  \x14  \x14 570 \x14 45.200001 \x14 0.340000 \x14 1.0900 \x14 3";
00848         nvt.SetValueText(datHeaderString);
00849         datHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00850         nvt.SetName(L"affymetrix-max-pixel-intensity");
00851         nvt.SetValueUInt16(46001);
00852         datHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00853         nvt.SetName(L"affymetrix-min-pixel-intensity");
00854         nvt.SetValueUInt16(1);
00855         datHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00856 
00857         // Add DAT GenericDataHeader as parent.
00858         data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(datHdr);
00859 
00860         WriteRemaingSmallCelFileWithGridParameters(data);
00861 }

00863 void TestFileGenerator::WriteSmallCelFileWithAFullDatHeaderTest()       // Files converted from GCOS will have a full DatHeader
00864 {
00865         CelFileData data("small_cel_file_full_datheader");
00866 
00867         // Write 
00868         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00869         GenericDataHeader datHdr;
00870         datHdr.SetFileId(AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid());
00871         datHdr.SetFileTypeId("affymetrix-calvin-scan-acquisition");
00872         datHdr.SetFileCreationTime(L"2004-07-01T13:14:15Z");
00873         nvt.SetName(L"affymetrix-dat-header");
00874         std::wstring datHeaderString = L"[45..56789]  small_cel_file_full_datheader:CLS=25   RWS=25   XIN=1  YIN=1  VE=0         0   05/19/05 02:45:59 ScannerID:  ScannerTyp   \x14  \x14 Hg-Small.1sq \x14  \x14  \x14  \x14  \x14 570 \x14 45.200001 \x14 0.340000 \x14 1.0900 \x14 3";
00875         nvt.SetValueText(datHeaderString);
00876         datHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00877 
00878         // Add DAT GenericDataHeader as parent.
00879         data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(datHdr);
00880 
00881         WriteRemaingSmallCelFileWithGridParameters(data);
00882 }

00984 
00985 void TestFileGenerator::WriteLargeCelFile()
00986 {
00987         CelFileData data("large_cel_file");
00988         data.SetRows(2560);
00989         data.SetCols(2560);
00990         int32_t cells = 2560*2560;
00991         data.SetIntensityCount(cells);
00992         data.SetStdDevCount(cells);
00993         data.SetPixelCount(cells);
00994         data.SetOutlierCount(2000);
00995         data.SetMaskCount(3000);
00996         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00997         nvt.SetName(L"percentile");
00998         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.75f);
00999         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
01000         nvt.SetName(L"outlierlow");
01001         nvt.SetValueFloat(1.004f);
01002         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
01003 
01004         CelFileWriter* writer = new CelFileWriter(data);
01005 
01006         FloatVector vInten;
01007         FloatVector vStdev;
01008         Int16Vector vPixels;
01009 
01010         vInten.resize(cells);
01011         vStdev.resize(cells);
01012         vPixels.resize(cells);
01013 
01014         int32_t intenTestValues[4] = {(int32_t)55683.0f, (int32_t)4568.0f, (int32_t)2368.0f, (int32_t)100.0f};
01015         float stdevTestValues[4] = {2.345f, 56.23f, 1.53f, 3.875f};
01016 
01017         //int32_t testIdx = 0;
01018         for (int32_t i=0, testIdx=0; i<cells; ++i, ++testIdx)
01019         {
01020                 if (testIdx >= 4)
01021                         testIdx = 0;
01022 
01023                 vInten[i] = intenTestValues[testIdx];
01024                 vStdev[i] = stdevTestValues[testIdx];
01025                 vPixels[i] = 25;
01026         }
01027 
01028         // Do some writing
01029         writer->WriteIntensities(vInten);
01030         writer->WriteStdDevs(vStdev);
01031         writer->WritePixels(vPixels);
01032 
01033         XYCoord xy(0,0);
01034         XYCoordVector outlier;
01035         for (int32_t i=0, col=2000; i<2000; ++i, --col)
01036         {
01037                 xy.xCoord = i;
01038                 xy.yCoord = col;
01039                 outlier.push_back(xy);
01040         }
01041         writer->WriteOutlierCoords(outlier);
01042 
01043         XYCoordVector masked;
01044         for (int32_t i=0; i<1500; ++i)
01045         {
01046                 xy.xCoord = 1200;
01047                 xy.yCoord = i;
01048                 masked.push_back(xy);
01049                 xy.xCoord = 2400;
01050                 xy.yCoord = i;
01051                 masked.push_back(xy);
01052         }
01053         writer->WriteMaskCoords(masked);
01054 
01055         delete writer;
01056 }
01057 
01058 void TestFileGenerator::WriteCelFileWithADataSetWithZeroRows()
01059 {
01060         CelFileData data("small_cel_file_with_dataset_of_zero_rows");
01061         data.SetIntensityCount(25);
01062         data.SetStdDevCount(25);
01063         data.SetPixelCount(25);
01064         data.SetOutlierCount(0);
01065         data.SetMaskCount(0);
01066         data.SetRows(5);
01067         data.SetCols(5);
01068         data.SetArrayType(L"Hg-small");
01069         data.SetAlgorithmName(L"Feature Extraction");
01070         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
01071         nvt.SetName(L"percentile");
01072         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.75f);
01073         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
01074         nvt.SetName(L"outlierlow");
01075         nvt.SetValueFloat(1.004f);
01076         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
01077 
01078         CelFileWriter* writer = new CelFileWriter(data);
01079 
01080         FloatVector vInten;
01081         FloatVector vStdev;
01082         Int16Vector vPixels;
01083 
01084         for (int i=0; i<25; ++i)
01085         {
01086                 vInten.push_back(100.0f*i);
01087                 vStdev.push_back(.123f);
01088                 vPixels.push_back(25);
01089         }
01090 
01091         // Do some writing
01092         writer->WriteIntensities(vInten);
01093         writer->WriteStdDevs(vStdev);
01094         writer->WritePixels(vPixels);
01095 
01096         XYCoordVector outlier;
01097         writer->WriteOutlierCoords(outlier);
01098 
01099         XYCoordVector masked;
01100         writer->WriteMaskCoords(masked);
01101 
01102         delete writer;
01103 }
01104 
01105 void TestFileGenerator::WriteDatFile(const std::string& name, const std::wstring& type, int32_t rows, int32_t cols, bool showProgress)
01106 {
01107         cout << "Started writing " << name.c_str() << endl;
01108 
01109         int32_t pixelCount = rows*cols;
01110         DATData data(name);
01111         data.SetPixelCount(pixelCount);
01112         data.SetStatsCount(1);
01113         data.SetArrayType(type);
01114         data.SetPixelSize(0.71f);
01115         data.SetScannerType(L"M10");
01116         data.SetScannerID(L"main");
01117         DateTime dt = DateTime::Parse(L"2005-12-25T11:12:13Z");
01118         data.SetScanDate(dt);
01119         data.SetRows(rows);
01120         data.SetCols(cols);
01121         DATFileWriter writer(data);
01122 
01123         Uint16Vector pixels;
01124         pixels.reserve(pixelCount);
01125 
01126         u_int16_t inten = 10;
01127         for (int32_t i=0; i<pixelCount; ++i, ++inten)
01128         {
01129                 if (inten > 46000)
01130                 {
01131                         inten = 0;
01132                         if (showProgress)
01133                                 cout << "Written " << i << " pixels so far..." << endl;
01134                 }
01135                 pixels.push_back(inten);
01136         }
01137 
01138         Uint16Vector stats;
01139         stats.push_back(pixels[0]);     // min
01140         stats.push_back(pixels[19]);    // max
01141 
01142         writer.WriteStats(stats);
01143         writer.WritePixels(pixels);
01144 
01145         cout << "Completed writing " << name.c_str() << endl;
01146 }
01147 
01148 void TestFileGenerator::AddGridAndSubgrids(DATData& data, float increment, int32_t subgridCnt)
01149 {
01150         // Write the grid
01151         FRegion ggRegion;
01152         float ptVal = 0.0;
01153         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
01154         {
01155                 FPoint point;
01156                 point.x = ptVal;
01157                 ptVal += increment;
01158                 point.y = ptVal;
01159                 ggRegion.pts.push_back(point);
01160         }
01161         u_int32_t ggStatus = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
01162         data.SetGlobalGrid(ggStatus, ggRegion);
01163 
01164         for(int n = 0; n < subgridCnt; n++)
01165         {
01166                 FRegion sgRegion;
01167                 float ptVal = 0.0 + (float)n;
01168                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
01169                 {
01170                         FPoint point;
01171                         point.x = ptVal;
01172                         ptVal += increment;
01173                         point.y = ptVal;
01174                         sgRegion.pts.push_back(point);
01175                 }
01176 
01177                 u_int32_t sgStatus = DATData::GridError | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
01178                 if (n % 2 == 0)
01179                         sgStatus = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
01180 
01181                 data.AddSubgrid(sgStatus, sgRegion);
01182         }
01183 }
01184 
01185 void TestFileGenerator::WriteSmallDatFile()
01186 {
01187         WriteDatFile("small_DAT_file", L"Hg-small", 4, 5, true);
01188 }
01189 
01190 void TestFileGenerator::WriteLargeDatFile()
01191 {
01192         WriteDatFile("large_DAT_file", L"Hg-large", 25100, 25100, true);
01193 }
01194 
01195 void TestFileGenerator::WriteSmallDatFileWithGridAndSubgrids()
01196 {
01197         std::string filename = "small_DAT_file_with_subgrids";
01198         WriteDatFile(filename, L"Hg-small", 4, 5, true);
01199 
01200         DATData data(filename);
01201         AddGridAndSubgrids(data, 2.5, 10);
01202 
01203         DATFileUpdater update(data);
01204         update.Update();
01205 }
01206 
01207 void TestFileGenerator::WriteExpressionCDFFile(const std::string& filename, u_int32_t probeSetCnt)
01208 {
01209         wchar_t name[100];
01210 
01211         u_int8_t unitType = 3;
01212         u_int8_t direction = 1;
01213         u_int32_t atoms = 11;
01214         u_int8_t cellsPerAtom = 2;
01215         u_int32_t cells = atoms*cellsPerAtom;
01216 
01217         CDFData data(filename);
01218         data.SetProbeSetCnt(probeSetCnt, Expression);
01219         data.SetArrayCols(atoms);
01220         data.SetArrayRows(probeSetCnt*cellsPerAtom);
01221         CDFFileWriter writer(data);
01222 
01223         for (u_int32_t i = 0; i < probeSetCnt; ++i)
01224         {
01225                 // make the unit name
01226                 FormatString1(name, 100, L"biob_%d", i);
01227 
01228                 writer.OpenDataGroup(name, 1);
01229                 CDFProbeSetWriter* probeWriter = writer.CreateProbeSetWriter(name,unitType,direction,atoms,cells,i,cellsPerAtom);
01230                 probeWriter->WriteHeader();
01231 
01232                 for (u_int32_t atom = 0; atom < atoms; ++atom)
01233                 {
01234                         for (u_int32_t cellInAtom = 0; cellInAtom < cellsPerAtom; ++cellInAtom)
01235                         {
01236                                 probeWriter->Write(atom,i*cellsPerAtom+cellInAtom,atom,atom,'C','G');
01237                         }
01238                 }
01239                 probeWriter->Close();
01240                 delete probeWriter;
01241                 writer.CloseDataGroup();        
01242         }
01243 }
01244

01254 
01255 void TestFileGenerator::WriteQCCDFFile(const std::string& filename, u_int32_t probeSetCnt)
01256 {
01257         wchar_t name[100];
01258 
01259         u_int32_t atoms = 11;
01260         u_int8_t cellsPerAtom = 2;
01261         //u_int32_t cells = atoms*cellsPerAtom;
01262 
01263         u_int8_t probeLength = 25;
01264         u_int8_t perfectMatchFlag = 0;
01265         u_int8_t backgroundProbeFlag = 0;
01266 
01267         CDFData data(filename);
01268         data.SetProbeSetCnt(probeSetCnt, Control);
01269         data.SetArrayCols(atoms);
01270         data.SetArrayRows(probeSetCnt*cellsPerAtom);
01271         CDFCntrlFileWriter writer(data);
01272 
01273         for (u_int32_t i = 0; i < probeSetCnt; ++i)
01274         {
01275                 // make the unit name
01276                 FormatString1(name, 100, L"control_%d", i);
01277 
01278                 writer.OpenDataGroup(name, 1);
01279                 CDFCntrlProbeSetWriter* probeWriter = writer.GetCntrlProbeSetWriter(name);
01280                 probeWriter->WriteHeader();
01281 
01282                 for (u_int32_t atom = 0; atom < atoms; ++atom)
01283                 {
01284                         for (u_int32_t cellInAtom = 0; cellInAtom < cellsPerAtom; ++cellInAtom)
01285                         {
01286                                 perfectMatchFlag = (cellInAtom % 2)? 1 : 0;
01287                                 backgroundProbeFlag = (atom % 2) ? 1 : 0;
01288                                 probeWriter->Write(atom,i*cellsPerAtom+cellInAtom, probeLength, perfectMatchFlag, backgroundProbeFlag);
01289                         }
01290                 }
01291                 probeWriter->Close();
01292                 delete probeWriter;
01293                 writer.CloseDataGroup();        
01294         }
01295 }
01296 
01297 void TestFileGenerator::WriteSmallQCCDFFile()
01298 {
01299         WriteQCCDFFile("small_QCCDF_file", 10);
01300 }

01302 void TestFileGenerator::WriteSmallDatFileWithGridAndSubgridsAndParameters()
01303 {
01304         std::string filename = "small_DAT_file_with_subgrids_and_parameters";
01305         WriteDatFile(filename, L"Hg-small", 4, 5, true);
01306 
01307         DATData data(filename);
01308         AddGridAndSubgrids(data, 2.5, 10);
01309 
01310         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
01311         nvt.SetName(L"Zip Code");
01312         nvt.SetValueInt32(95051);
01313         data.AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
01314         nvt.SetName(L"County");
01315         nvt.SetValueText(L"Santa Clara");
01316         data.AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
01317 
01318         DATFileUpdater update(data);
01319         update.Update();
01320 }
01321 
01322 void TestFileGenerator::WriteSmallDatFileWithReservedStringParameters()
01323 {
01324         int32_t rows = 4;
01325         int32_t cols = 5;
01326         int32_t pixelCount = rows*cols;
01327         DATData data("small_dat_file_with_reserved_string_parameters");
01328         data.SetPixelCount(pixelCount);
01329         data.SetStatsCount(1);
01330         data.SetArrayType(L"Hg_small");
01331         data.SetPixelSize(0.71f);
01332         data.SetScannerType(L"M10");
01333         data.SetScannerID(L"main");
01334         DateTime dt = DateTime::Parse(L"2005-12-25T11:12:13Z");
01335         data.SetScanDate(dt);
01336         data.SetRows(rows);
01337         data.SetCols(cols);
01338         std::string arrayId = "smellsliketeenspirit";
01339         data.SetArrayId(arrayId);
01340         
01341         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
01342         nvt.SetName(L"fixedlen");
01343         nvt.SetValueText(L"twenty-five", 25);
01344         data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(nvt);
01345 
01346         DATFileWriter writer(data);
01347 
01348         Uint16Vector pixels;
01349         pixels.reserve(pixelCount);
01350 
01351         u_int16_t inten = 10;
01352         for (int32_t i=0; i<pixelCount; ++i, ++inten)
01353         {
01354                 if (inten > 46000)
01355                 {
01356                         inten = 0;
01357                 }
01358                 pixels.push_back(inten);
01359         }
01360 
01361         Uint16Vector stats;
01362         stats.push_back(pixels[0]);     // min
01363         stats.push_back(pixels[19]);    // max
01364 
01365         writer.WriteStats(stats);
01366         writer.WritePixels(pixels);
01367 }
